description: MEMORANDUM DECISION, Haynes has failed to show a basis for relief under 28 U.S.C. § 2254. Accordingly, his habeas petition is denied. Additionally, I decline to issue a  certificate of appealability because Haynes has not made a substantial show ing of the denial  of a constitutional right. See 28 U.S.C. § 2253. Pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 1915(a)(3), I certify that any appeal taken from this decision and order would not be taken in good faith. The Clerk of the Court shall enter judgme nt accordingly and close this case. The Clerk shall also mail copies of this memorandum decision and the judgment to Haynes at his last known address. So Ordered by Circuit Judge VJ-Denny Chin on 2/15/2023.(fwd'd for jgm) (c/m to    Marcell Haynes, 16-A-3060, Eastern NY Correctional Facility, P.O. Box 338, Napanoch, NY 12458-0338)  (TL)
